body_html:
I see the error:

ERROR: [...] java.io.IOException: Error downloading [...] Tried to reconnect at offset 1,808,859 but server didn't support it and referenced by '@io_bazel_rules_closure//java/io/bazel/rules/closure/webfiles/server:listing'.

That error should be ephemeral and was fixed in bazelbuild/bazel@0e866a8. Try retrying ./configure.

For further support, please try StackOverflow.
body_text:
I see the error:
ERROR: [...] java.io.IOException: Error downloading [...] Tried to reconnect at offset 1,808,859 but server didn't support it and referenced by '@io_bazel_rules_closure//java/io/bazel/rules/closure/webfiles/server:listing'.
That error should be ephemeral and was fixed in bazelbuild/bazel@0e866a8. Try retrying ./configure.
For further support, please try StackOverflow.
body:
I see the error:

ERROR: [...] java.io.IOException: Error downloading [...] Tried to reconnect at offset 1,808,859 but server didn't support it and referenced by '@io_bazel_rules_closure//java/io/bazel/rules/closure/webfiles/server:listing'.

That error should be ephemeral and was fixed in https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/commit/0e866a8b732e31df1a4ddfd13c4870d4721de70b. Try retrying `./configure`.

For further support, please try [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow).
